```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(broom)
```


```{r}
#read data
data = read_csv("./data/homicide-data.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  drop_na() |>
  mutate(city_state = paste(city, state, sep="_"), 
         not_solved = if_else(
           disposition %in% c("Closed without arrest", "Open/No arrest"), 1, 0))  # if match, add 1, otherwise, add 0. 
```

```{r}
data |>
  group_by(city_state) |>
  summarize(
    number_of_homicides = n(), #count
    not_solved_homicides = sum(not_solved) #sum
  ) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
